sentences.english: You mean, you go to the piece of guttering Blackwater river to drink it?

sentences.english: The bottom of the metal is made of black crystal and metals.

sentences.english: The last movement, Hacha is the afterworld of the Choctaw tribe of Native Americans.
sentences.chinese: 《黑水河》則講述了美國原住民喬克託部落的來世。
